name: Faceez: Monsters!
synopsis: Faceez is back, and this time it will...scare your friends to death!Faceez: Monsters! features new disguises and accessories, each more frightening than the other! Living dead, werewolves, vampires, zombies... Take pictures of your friendsâ€™ faces and turn them into abominable monsters! Place them in your own settings! Laughter and fun guaranteed. Thanks to the Facebook connection of your Nintendo DSi, share your monstrous creations with the entire world.
